about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in an exciting 2D "souls-like" adventure set in a remote medieval village. Assume the role of a wolf hunter who will have to survive in a changing scenario ruled by paranoia and confusion. Witness the decline of a community stalked every night by beasts.

Original and dynamic plot

Explore a constantly changing environment. Watch a living scenario where days and nights are happening as you fight increasingly fierce and ruthless wolves. Will you survive to eradicate all beasts? Will you succumb to lycanthropy?

A classic combat experience

Master simple, precise, and demanding combat. Defend the town by sword and gun against different enemies, each with a different fighting style. Never turn your back on them!

Epic battles against fearsome bosses

Challenge monstrous bosses in pure "souls-like" fighting, where you’ll have to recognize the enemy’s behavior and adapt to their deadly blows. Although the enemies will not make it easy for you; their behavior will change drastically when they get angry.

The secrets of the past

The most attentive eyes can discover the strange and mysterious story of the Red Brotherhood, the first wolf hunters. A story full of holes, lies and secrets, which casts a shadow from the past on the small town in which you find yourself.

Main features

  • Simple and precise controls
  • An unusual story, with several unexpected twists and dark revelations for lovers of secrets
  • Intuitive but demanding combat, with ready enemies like hunger. Watch your back!
  • 2D style care and immersive
  • Secondary content: Hunt creepy beasts lurking deep in the forest.
  • Defeat memorable bosses.
  • An absorbing plot of approximately 3 hours of play, with several endings to discover

content_descriptors.notes: Some scenes might be creepy or slightly disturbing for some people

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Take on an outbreak of lycanthropy in this medieval 2D “souls-like”! Master an intuitive but demanding combat system, meet enigmatic characters, defeat terrifying bosses and unravel an original plot of revenge and fear. Will you eradicate the plague or succumb to lycanthropy?
